sentences.english: Objective To investigate the curative effects of laparoscope operation and spermatic veins operation in patients with spermophlebectasia.

sentences.english: Conclusion FG is the adhesive which can greatly decrease the rate of adhesion.
sentences.chinese: 结论纤维蛋白胶可有效降低腹腔术后粘连发生率。

sentences.english: With laparoscopy the recovery time is about one to two days.

sentences.english: Laparoscopic cholecystectomies are successfully performed by us for 24 cases.

sentences.english: The mainstay of treatment of pelvic factor infertility relies on laparoscopy and hysteroscopy.

sentences.english: The immunosuppression model was established by CTX injected into abdominal cavity of the KunMing Mus musculus albus.
